mapper.select: SELECT id, title, trans_type, deposit, fee, const_type, floor, address, trans_done, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) AS timestamp, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("id", id, "user_id", user_id, "path", path, "timestamp", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp))) FROM images WHERE images.room_id = rooms.id ) AS images, ( SELECT COUNT(room_id) FROM favorites WHERE favorites.room_id = rooms.id ) AS fav_count FROM rooms LIMIT #{from}, #{count}

SELECT id, user_id, title, description, trans_type, fee, manage_fee, manage_tags, deposit, floor, const_floor, const_type, valid_dimen, supply_dimen, options, elevator, parking, temp_sys, address, contact, trans_done, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(avail_date) AS avail_date, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) AS timestamp, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("id", id, "user_id", user_id, "path", path, "timestamp", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp))) FROM images WHERE images.room_id = rooms.id ) AS images, ( SELECT COUNT(room_id) FROM favorites WHERE favorites.room_id = rooms.id ) AS fav_count FROM rooms WHERE id = #{room_id}
